title: Computer Technology-Based Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education knowledge and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: A short-term course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields with advanced language proficiency. Conducts project-based assessments in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Design three types of language teaching activities using digital tools (apps, web-based platforms).
Establish learner engagement strategies by applying smartphone-based assessment tools.
Develop a blended learning scenario executable in a limited-technology environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
